All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBooking
 
AddBookingWindow
The class AddBookingWindow represents a window in a GUI application for adding a new booking to the flight booking system.
AddCustomer
 
AddCustomerWindow
AddCustomerWindow is a JFrame class that allows users to add a new customer to the flight booking system It displays a form where the user can enter the customer's name, phone, and email.
AddFlight
 
AddFlightWindow
The AddFlightWindow class is a GUI window that allows the user to add a new flight to the flight booking system.
Booking
The Booking class represents a booking made by a customer for a flight.
BookingDataManager
 
CancelBooking
 
Command
 
CommandParser
 
Customer
The Customer class represents a customer of the flight booking system.
CustomerDataManager
 
DataManager
The DataManager interface defines the behavior for classes that handle data loading and storing for a FlightBookingSystem.
EditBooking
 
Flight
This class represents a flight in a flight booking system.
FlightBookingSystem
A class that represents a flight booking system.
FlightBookingSystemData
This class is responsible for managing the loading and storing of data for the FlightBookingSystem.
FlightBookingSystemException
Exception thrown by the Flight Booking System.
FlightDataManager
 
Help
 
ListCustomers
 
ListFlights
 
LoadGUI
 
Main
 
MainWindow
The MainWindow class appears to be a graphical user interface (GUI) for a flight booking system.
RemoveBookingWindow
This class represents a GUI window that allows the user to delete a booking from the flight booking system.
RemoveCustomer
 
RemoveCustomerWindow
This class represents a window for deleting a customer from the flight booking system.
RemoveFlight
 
RemoveFlightWindow
The RemoveFlightWindow class represents a graphical user interface for deleting a flight in the flight booking system It extends the JFrame class and implements the ActionListener interface When the delete button is clicked, the delBook() method is called to delete the flight from the system When the cancel button is clicked, the window is closed.
ShowBookingWindow
This class represents a window for showing bookings.
ShowCustomer
 
ShowFlight
 
ShowPassengersWindow
ShowPassengersWindow is a JFrame class that allows the user to view a list of passengers on a specific flight.
UpdateBookingWindow
UpdateBookingWindow is a GUI class that allows the user to update a booking by providing the booking ID and the flight ID It provides text fields to input these values and buttons to submit the update or cancel the operation The updateBook() method is called when the update button is clicked, and it uses the EditBooking command to update the booking The actionPerformed() method handles the button clicks and calls the appropriate methods.
